notes:
Before running the FileZilla Server I recommend you install 'sudo' with 'scoop install sudo'.
To install the FileZilla Server as a service, type 'sudo filezilla-server /install auto' to automatically start on system start, or 'sudo filezilla-server /install' to manually launch the service.
To uninstall the FileZilla Server service, type 'sudo filezilla-server /uninstall'. This requires the server to be stopped.
To start the server service run 'sudo net start "FileZilla Server"' and to stop it 'sudo net stop "FileZilla Server"'.
To setup an admin port use 'filezilla-server /adminport [yourdesiredport]'.
